SELECT a.signno ,a.eno ,a.dno ,a.sformno ,a.classcode ,a.ddate ,a.emergency ,a.title ,a.edate ,a.sopen ,a.signcontent ,a.tempsave ,a.state ,a.takeover ,c.VIEWCNT ,d.name ,e.FORMTEXT FROM signdoc a, FAVDOC b, APPROVAL c ,employee d,signform e where a.SIGNNO=c.SIGNNO and b.SIGNNO = c.SIGNNO and a.eno =d.eno and a.sformno = e.sformno and b.eno=#{eno}

select DISTINCT REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.tagcontent, '[^ ]+', 1, c.lv) as tagcontent from hashtag a, (select a.signNo as signNo from signDoc a, approval b where a.signNo = b.signNo and a.eno = #{eno}) b, (SELECT LEVEL AS lv FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10)c where a.hashno = b.signNo AND REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.tagcontent, '[^ ]+', 1, c.lv) IS NOT NULL
select signNo from signDoc where state = 5 and sopen = 1

SELECT a.signno, a.eno, a.dno, a.sformno, a.classcode, a.ddate, a.emergency, a.title, a.edate, a.sopen, a.signcontent, a.tempsave, a.state, a.takeover, a.viewcnt FROM signdoc a, FAVDOC b where a.signno = b.signno and b.eno = #{eno}
